            <table align="center" cellpadding="0px" class="inset12">
             <tr>
              <td align="center">
               <h1>
                <span class="option-title">
                 <font color="#A22F19">
                  Kiboko - Safaris the way you like them
                 </font>
                </span>
               </h1>
               <center>
                <table class="filler3">
                 <tr>
                  <td height="37px">
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                </table>
               </center>
               <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="line-height:14pt;padding:15px;padding-top:0;">
                <td align="left">
                 <span class="option-main-text">
                  <font style="font-size:11pt">
                   <h1 style="text-align: center; color: #ff0000;">
                    <img alt="" src="../kb/photos/pages/8/30446110281_7e7f89676f_k-002.jpg" width="100%"/>
                   </h1>
                   <h2 style="text-align: center;">
                    Kiboko Safaris have been set up to give you the opportunity to compose the personalized safari you want and suits your travel expectations and budget!
                   </h2>
                   <p style="text-align: center;">
                    You can combine the various safari destinations in Malawi with the different safari options in the South Luangwa NP in Zambia and even extend the safari to the mighty Victoria Waterfalls. All this the way you want to be accommodated and transported around; camping or lodging, driving one of our special equipped vehicles or flying to your safari destinations. Take your pick!
                   </p>
                   <h3 style="text-align: center;">
                    <span style="color: #330000;">
                     <strong>
                      <a href="../kb/info/safari_3_additional_info_2.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank" title="Bus &amp; Flight Details from Chipata to Lusaka and Livingstone">
                       <span style="color: #330000;">
                        <strong>
                         <span style="color: #993300;">
                          The Kiboko Experience Safaris give you the flexibility you need to enjoy your holiday of choice in Malawi and Zambia. Our Safaris depart from Lilongwe, Lusaka, Chipata and Mfuwe!
                         </span>
                        </strong>
                       </span>
                      </a>
                     </strong>
                    </span>
                    <span style="color: #330000;">
                     <strong>
                      <span style="color: #330000;">
                       <br/>
                      </span>
                     </strong>
                    </span>
                   </h3>
                   <div data-contents="true" style="text-align: center;">
                    <hr/>
                    <div data-contents="true">
                     <h3 style="text-align: center;">
                      <span style="font-size: x-large; color: #99cc00;">
                       <strong>
                        KIBOKO SAFARIS PHOTO CONTEST
                       </strong>
                      </span>
                     </h3>
                     <p style="text-align: center;">
                      <span style="font-size: small; color: #993300;">
                       For all of you who have been on a safari with us in the past, Kiboko is organising a
                       <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
                        <strong>
                         <span style="font-size: medium;">
                          Photo Contest
                         </span>
                        </strong>
                       </span>
                       again! Share your best safari pictures on our
                       <a href="https://www.facebook.com/kiboko.safaris/">
                        <strong>
                         <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
                          <span style="font-size: medium;">
                           Facebook Page
                          </span>
                         </span>
                        </strong>
                       </a>
                       <br/>
                       and stand to win a
                       <span style="font-size: medium;">
                        <strong>
                         <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
                          Free Safari
                         </span>
                        </strong>
                       </span>
                       organised by Kiboko Safaris!
                      </span>
                     </p>
                     <p style="text-align: center;">
                      <span style="font-size: small; color: #993300;">
                       <img src="../kb/photos/pages/8/1511895_10151889646472444_449816859_o.jpg" width="451"/>
                      </span>
                     </p>
                     <p style="text-align: center;">
                      <em>
                       <span style="font-size: xx-small;">
                        This contest runs from 01/05/2017 until 31/08/2017. Terms and conditions apply and can be provided on request.
                       </span>
                      </em>
                     </p>
                     <div data-contents="true" style="text-align: center;">
                      <hr/>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <h3 style="text-align: center;">
                    <span style="font-size: x-large; color: #99cc00;">
                     Game drive promotion!
                    </span>
                   </h3>
                   <div data-contents="true">
                    <div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="3a017" data-offset-key="4q9s7-0-0">
                     <div class="_1mf _1mj" data-offset-key="4q9s7-0-0" style="text-align: center;">
                      <span data-offset-key="4q9s7-0-0">
                       On all our 4 day safaris you can take advantage of the first afternoon on arrival to do an extra gamedrive at the discounted price of 40 USD pp including park entry fee worth 25 USD pp!
                      </span>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="3a017" data-offset-key="8c8rr-0-0">
                     <div class="_1mf _1mj" data-offset-key="8c8rr-0-0" style="text-align: center;">
                      <span data-offset-key="8c8rr-0-0">
                       Enquire in our bookings office, send us an email or message us on Facebook to add this to your booking!
                      </span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="_1mf _1mj" data-offset-key="8c8rr-0-0" style="text-align: center;">
                      <img src="../kb/photos/pages/8/1502330_10151890189047444_1281599866_o.jpg" width="451"/>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <hr/>
                   <h3 style="text-align: center;">
                    <span style="font-size: x-large; color: #99cc00;">
                     New from Kiboko!
                    </span>
                   </h3>
                   <p style="text-align: center;">
                    Mercedes Sprinter buses for hire. Comfortable, air-conditioned 14 seater buses, including qualified and experienced driver. The ideal solution for your (school, church, sports, work) group (multi-)day trips in Malawi and/or Zambia. Prices starting from 200 USD per day. For more information send us an email at
                    <a href="mailto:enquiries@kiboko-safaris.com,">
                     enquiries@kiboko-safaris.com,
                    </a>
                    contact us on Facebook or visit our bookings office!
                   </p>
                   <p style="text-align: center;">
                    <img src="../kb/photos/pages/8/sprinter-edit.jpg" width="428"/>
                   </p>
                   <p>
                   </p>
                   <hr/>
                  </font>
                 </span>

            <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="inset11" width="640px">
             <tr>
              <td align="left" class="inset9" style="padding-top:25px;" valign="top" width="306px">
               <center>
                <span class="option-title">
                 <font color="#A22F19">
                  Africa House
                 </font>
                </span>
                <div style="height:5px;margin:0;padding:0;">
                </div>
                <p>
                 <a href="../Africa_House.asp">
                  <img alt="" height="190" src="../kb/photos/pages/8/Pool_and_Lodge.jpg" width="272"/>
                 </a>
                </p>
                <p style="text-align: left;">
                 <span style="font-size: small;">
                  We have created a stylish contemporary lodge from a unique blend of African designs, furniture, fabrics and our personal collectables. Each room is named after an African country, style or culture and decorated in that particular style.
                 </span>
                </p>
               </center>
              </td>
              <td width="26px">
              </td>
              <td align="left" class="inset9" style="padding-top:25px;" valign="top" width="306px">
               <center>
                <span class="option-title">
                 <font color="#A22F19">
                  Kiboko Town Hotel
                 </font>
                </span>
                <div style="height:5px;margin:0;padding:0;">
                </div>
                <p>
                 <a href="../Town_Hotel.asp">
                  <img alt="" height="190" src="../kb/photos/pages/8/Kiboko_Town_Hotel.jpg" style="margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; display: block;" width="272"/>
                 </a>
                </p>
                <p style="text-align: left;">
                 <span style="font-size: small;">
                  Situated in the centre of Old Town Lilongwe, the hotel is ideal for sightseeing and for the growing range of services available in this part of Malawi’s capital city. Wireless internet access is provided in the hotel and restaurant.
                 </span>
                </p>
